name: Zombie Apocalypse Mini Golf (VR)
description: The Zombie Apocalypse rages on, and after a long hard day of killing zombies and avoiding hostile humans, you need to blow off some steam. Which means grab your favorite chain-wrapped baseball bat, and putt-putt some zombie heads on your home-made post apocalyptic mini golf course! The destruction of the world as we know it doesn't mean we can't be civilized...
